summary: Consistent effort and determination can eventually lead to success, even when faced with repeated failures and setbacks.
An individual's ability to bounce back from challenges and maintain focus on their goals is crucial in overcoming obstacles.
Despite numerous setbacks, maintaining a strong commitment to one's goals can ultimately lead to achievement.
Seeking help and guidance from others can be instrumental in overcoming personal challenges and achieving success.
Continued perseverance in the face of adversity can result in eventual triumph and fulfillment of one's aspirations.
